author: craigmcc
msg: Add support for optionally calculating a Locale for the current user (based
on the HTTP request headers) and storing it in the user's session if no Locale
has been stored there by the application.
To enable this functionality on every request, set the servlet initialization
parameter "locale" to "true".

author: craigmcc
msg: Pass the current request as a parameter to the processMapping() method, so
that subclasses can make access control (or other) decisions based on request
parameters or other properties (such as user identity).

author: craigmcc
msg: Fix the following bugs:
* PropertyUtils.getPropertyType() incorrectly returned null for an indexed
property if there was also a non-indexed accessor method.
* PropertyUtils.setIndexedProperty() was missing a return statement if an
indexed setter was found.
Submitted by: Ate Douma <ate@iwise1.demon.nl>

author: craigmcc
msg: Update the build scripts to include all official DTDs in the documentation
application (so that they will be included on the web site), and update
the "deploy" targets for Tomcat 3.x and Tomcat 4.0 (i.e. Catalina).

author: craigmcc
msg: Modify ActionServlet to support the new configuration file format.  The
old format is still supported, but this will be phased out by 1.0 release.
Convert ActionMapping from an interface to a base class, and deprecate
ActionMappingBase.  This will not cause backwards compatibility problems
unless applications were implementing ActionMapping themselves.
Deprecate the ActionMapping methods that were used only in the old
configuration file format, in favor of the properties for the new format.
Support registration of form bean information by logical name, so that
particular form beans can be more easily shared between actions.
